column4: Normally I write "dpkg-reconfigure locales" in order to redefine the list of installed locales. But now it just re-calculates the locales giving me no selection list. How do I modify the list of installed locales then?
check the options on dpkg-reconfigure, the priopirty thing might do it
Nope. Even -p low just regenerates the locales without showing the selection list
odd, checked for bugs on launchpad?
